name: Through the Void
description:
In Through the Void, you take the role of a soul trying to escape the shadowy depths of the Void. Take on an intense bullethell boss in a minimalist setting to win your freedom! Includes two difficulty levels - Normal Mode, and Ultra Mode, which adds new patterns and attacks. How far can you get?

If you enjoyed the game, you can check out future projects on my Twitter or Tumblr page! We have GIFs!

Code, art and game by Jacob Vanbendegon

Music by EliteFerrex. Check out their Bandcamp here: https://eliteferrex.bandcamp.com/
